thread.title_full: When Abhishek danced to dad Amitabh Bachchan's classic song 'Khaike Paan Banaraswala' - Entertainment

title: When Abhishek danced to dad Amitabh Bachchan's classic song 'Khaike Paan Banaraswala' - Entertainment
text:
By The Hitlist Team | Posted 52 minutes ago Now Available on the mid-day iOS App, Download Now 
Abhishek Bachchan 
Dressed in a canary yellow kurta, Abhishek Bachchan danced to father Amitabh Bachchan's classic number, Khaike Paan Banaraswala, at Anushka Rajan's star-studded wedding in Abu Dhabi. Junior B regaled guests by replicating his dad's moves. 
Several B-Town stars attended the wedding of real estate baron Abhijit Rajan's daughter.
